work.summary: Independent summer internship. Developed and managed a number of supplementary frontend frameworks for the dynamic CICD process of major digital media brands such as Sportsnet and Today's Parent. Additionally developed and deployed a Node.js driven MySQL interface for use by a concurrently developed internal Angular application.

education.area: Computer Science; Physical & Environmental Geography; History & Philosophy of Science & Technology
